mapper.insert: insert into ec_health_file (chk_date, chk_no, cust_no, med_org_nam, consul_room, principal_doctor, file_typ, chek_content, file_url, file_blob, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medOrgNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consulRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chekContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBlob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_health_file set med_org_nam = #{medOrgNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consul_room = #{consulRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_doctor = #{principalDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_typ = #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chek_content = #{chekContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_blob = #{fileBlob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where chk_date = #{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and chk_no = #{chkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select chk_date, chk_no, cust_no, med_org_nam, consul_room, principal_doctor, file_typ, chek_content, file_url, file_blob, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_health_file
